betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Magic Mirror is a device that can teleport items across latitudes. 

To use the Magic Mirror, you need to put down one Magic Mirror, then take another Magic Mirror and right click on the Magic Mirror placed on the ground, at this time, this mirror in your hand will show a black hole pattern, indicating a successful link. 

When the hand of the magic mirror placed, the other side of the magic mirror will also appear in the black hole pattern, to one of the magic mirror to throw things will be in the link of the other side of the magic mirror spit out things. 
\nMagic Mirrors can only be linked in pairs, and no link can be established with a third Magic Mirror after installation. When a disassembled Magic Mirror is re-installed, he can automatically link to the Magic Mirror that has been paired. 
\nÂ§cWarning: the Magic Mirror creates 1 point of Spellwave for every 128 items it transmits.
